Upcoming

RTAC INNOVATION WEBINAR SERIES

Join Us for the RTAC Innovation Webinar Series!

Please join the ICI for our upcoming webinar series, Innovation in VR Program Management. These webinars are part of an ongoing series where members of the NIDRR-funded RTAC on Vocational Rehabilitation Program Management present the projects they’ve implemented and the lessons they’ve learned over the last year.

This webinar series will run from July 10 through October 21. It’s a great opportunity to learn about effective practices from the vocational rehabilitation (VR) field and to explore innovations that are making a difference in VR program management.

The RTAC is a collaborative initiative to identify, test, and disseminate management practices to build a performance management model tailored to the VR system. These webinars are free and open to the public. Register, and learn how state VR agencies are applying innovation to solve their toughest challenges!

Motivational Interviewing : An Organizational Improvement Driver for Missouri Vocational Rehabilitation

Thursday, July 10, 2014 from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM EST

Connecticut Rehabilitation Services Strategic Planning: Addressing Program Structure and Mission

Thursday, July 17, 2014 from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM EST

Developing Measures of Quality VR Counseling in Kentucky Office of Vocational Rehabilitation

Wednesday, July 30, 2014 from 1:30 PM to 2:30 PM EST

MyVR - An Internal Client Communication Application for Nebraska Vocational Rehabilitation

*Wednesday, August 13, 2014 from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM EST

Strategies for Increasing the Hourly Earnings of VR Consumers in Western North Carolina and Resulting Implications for Statewide Expansion

Wednesday, August 27, 2014 from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM EST

Financial Services Job Development in the New Jersey Division of Vocational Rehabilitation

September 11, 2014 from 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM EST.

Kentucky Office for the Blind’s Experience with the Career Centers

Wednesday, October 1, 2014 from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM EST

Quality Assurance Practices through Vendor Utilization Management in California Department of Rehabilitation

Thursday, October 2, 2014 from 1:00 to 2:00 pm EST

Delaware Division of Vocational Rehabilitation's Quality Journey

Workforce Planning and Management Support in Colorado Vocational Rehabilitation

Tuesday, October 21 from 12:30- 1:30 pm EST

Current VR Projects

© ExploreVR.org — ExploreVR is part of the Vocational Rehabilitation Research and Training Center (VR-RRTC). The VR-RRTC is a national center that builds the capacity of the public vocational rehabilitation (VR) program to improve employment outcomes for people with disabilities. The VR-RRTC is funded by the National Institute on Disability and Rehabilitation Research and the Rehabilitation Services Administration of the US Department of Education. Visit the VR-RRTC website (www.vr-rrtc.org) for more information about the center’s policy research, training, and technical assistance efforts.
